channel.title: 开始入门 on Go 中文档集
channel.description: Recent content in 开始入门 on Go 中文档集

item.title: 概述
item.description: 原文：https://gorm.io/docs/index.html The fantastic ORM library for Golang aims to be developer friendly. Full-Featured ORM 功能齐全的ORM Associations (Has One, Has Many, Belongs To, Many To Many, Polymorphism, Single-table inheritance) 关联

item.title: 声明模型
item.description: 原文：https://gorm.io/docs/models.html Models are normal structs with basic Go types, pointers/alias of them or custom types implementing Scanner and Valuer interfaces ​ 模型是具有基本Go类型的普通结

item.title: 连接到数据库
item.description: 原文：https://gorm.io/docs/connecting_to_the_database.html GORM officially supports the databases MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite, SQL Server, and TiDB ​ GO
